TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReflect

span.span: Interoperates with the [IDispatch interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面用來與交互操作[IDispatch 介面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)。The interface is used to interoperate with the [IDispatch interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5). 定義的子集反映方法。 defines a subset of the reflection methods. 實作這個介面可讓類型以自訂其行為，當從 COM 做為存取物件時`IDispatch`物件。Implementing this interface enables a type to customize its behavior when the object is being accessed from COM as an `IDispatch` object. 類別可以用來封送處理該物件會實作或為 COM`IDispatch`物件，反之亦然。The class can be used to marshal an object that implements or as a COM `IDispatch` object, and vice versa.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據指定繫結器和引動過程屬性的條件約束，所要叫用的方法必須可存取，並提供與指定引數清單最特定的符合項目。The method that is to be invoked must be accessible and provide the most specific match with the specified argument list, under the constraints of the specified binder and invocation attributes. 如果方法宣告中的參數數目等於在指定的引數清單中，引數的數目和每個引數的型別可轉換為參數的型別繫結器，則會叫用方法。A method is invoked if the number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the specified argument list, and the type of each argument can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter. > [!NOTE] > 參數修飾詞的陣列傳遞至方法必須包含單一參數修飾詞。The array of parameter modifiers passed to the method must contain a single parameter modifier. 當判斷哪一個引數必須以傳參考公開給 COM 時，會被視為只有第一個參數修飾詞Only the first parameter modifier is considered when determining which argument needs to be passed by reference when exposed to COM. 繫結器會尋找所有比對方法的詳細資訊，根據要求的繫結的類型 (，等等)。The binder finds all matching methods, in accordance with the type of binding requested (, , and so on). 一組方法會依名稱、 目的引數，以及一組繫結器中所定義的搜尋修飾詞進行篩選。The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder. 方法選取之後，它會叫用，並協助工具已在該點。After the method is selected, it is invoked, and accessibility is checked at that point. 搜尋可能會控制哪一組方法會搜尋根據與方法關聯的協助工具屬性。The search may control which set of methods is searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method. 選取要叫用的方法。 selects the method to be invoked. 預設繫結器會選取最特定的相符項目。The default binder selects the most specific match. 完全信任程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取和完全信任程式碼時，透過反映叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked through reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. ## Examples 下列範例會取得的值屬性。The following example obtains the value of the property. [!code-cpp[Classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
